concept.title: Installation and test suites execution in Airflow

conbody.p: Installation and test suites execution in the Airflow GUI includes the following:

li.p: configuring environment (CBAM, OpenStack, VMware vCloud, VNF and SDC Config files) before and after installation, and for test execution
running standard and custom Robot test suites

conbody.p: The Airflow GUI includes a number of menus that are used to manage and configure test suites including the Online Guide menu, which provides the documentation for RobotSPS keywords and existing test suites in Maestro. The user can access the menu from the Airflow GUI at any time for reference or details about tests and keywords. It provides assistance for automating test cases and provides details about keyword usage.

note.p: For more information on Airflow, see Airflow documentation.
